description: Sending a letter within the Isle of Man or to the UK is to rise by five pence from April 2020.
title: Isle of Man Post Office announces 5p mail price hike
title_page: Isle of Man Post Office announces 5p mail price hike - BBC News
maintext: He continued: "It is a commercial decision, but I fear the impact will be greatest on business users who will simply have another reason to revaluate their use of on island postal services."
